message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be a great fit for you. I'm asking $9,500 for it, which is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $9,500 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay.  I'm happy to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down a little bit to $9,250.  This is still a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm confident it will be worth it to you. Let me know if you're interested.
